name: Christomasu!
description:
Reindeers have invaded, uhh, a box! You need to yeet them out with Christmas Trees!

A small mini-game made in a single Christmas evening. It has been made purely for fun. The goal of the game is to shoot reindeers out of the map. Enjoy. And Merry Christmas!

Controls:
WSAD - Movement
Space - Jump
F - Shoot
Shift - Sprint
Ctrl - Crouch
Esc - Exit the game

Credits:
Song used in the game is Twelve Days of StarCraft by Blizzard
